name: Across the Lake
description:
Across the Lake

The world is in a weird awful time right now.  This is a cozy, chill game about a stone skipping  across a lake.

Instructions

Use the space bar to skip when you hit the water, see how many skips you can get.

Credits
  • game: Stephan Steinbach (https://twitter.com/stephan_gfx)
  • visuals: Morgan McGuire (https://twitter.com/casualeffects)
  • sound: Steve Lavietes (https://twitter.com/stevelavietes)
  • physics/feel: Forrester Cole (https://twitter.com/forrestercole)

Made for Ludum Dare 46 -- "Keep It Alive"
